title: Sleds
description: In Sleds, students will read about the many uses for sleds in work, sports, and just for plain old fun! Students will have an opportunity to make connections to prior knowledge as they read this simple yet informative text. Detailed photographs offer an opportunity for students to practice comparing and contrasting while learning about various types of sleds.
meta: bends, glides, riders, steer, track, travel
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Initial and Final Sounds : Discriminate final consonant /s/ sound
Prepositions : Recognize and use the prepositions on and or

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
